title: PHPutf8_decode()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPutf8_decode()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content: Example Decode a UTF-8 string to ISO-8859-1: "; echo utf8_decode($text); ?> Definition and Usage The utf8_decode() function decodes a UTF-8 string to ISO-8859-1. This function decodes a string, utf8_encode() function, back to ISO-8859-1. Syntax utf8_decode(string) Parameter Values Parameter Description string Required. Specifies a UTF-8 encoded string to decode Technical Details Return Value: The decoded string on success. FALSE on failure PHP Version: 4.0+ ★ +1
